akn:section.akn:heading: Mandatory set-asides for small business enterprises and certified business enterprises with respect to follow-on and renewable acquisitions.

akn:content.akn:p: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, where a contract or procurement is awarded by a District agency to a small business enterprise or certified business enterprise, its follow-on or renewable acquisition shall be set aside for small business enterprises or certified business enterprises.
